/* The Position of Turkey */grammar-please reread yourself.
Adding back NPOV tag, maybe possibly the totallydisputed, the recent major changes made this article a mess. Please use talk page before important changes.
/* The Position of Turkey */Don't attribute your opinions to the Republic of Turkey, there is no work ever answering to that. If there is, cite it.
/* The Position of Turkey */This was not a disagreed issue, who claims it is stable, and where Turkey answer to that?
/* The Position of Turkey */ rewrite this sentence, I don't understand its meaning.
/* The Position of Turkey */under which declaration were the Armenians permitted to return, consider that their properties were sold by the government.
/* The Position of Turkey */The genocide covers 1917-18, I didn't knew Turkey had an answer for the war of independence, cite your source please.
/* The Position of Turkey */ In which government publication those are addressed?
/* The Position of Turkey */ Turkey doesn't maintain that about researchers, and it is plain wrong, most researcher do maintain that there are evidences.
/* The Position of Turkey */ I fail to see what the Holocaust methodology has to do there, and to consider that there are two ideologies of the Holocaust, the functionalism and the...
/* The Position of Turkey */ It is yet to be supported that Turkey see those as criminal, when those same people are considered as national heros by the National Assembly.
/* The Position of Turkey */transit camps not to be confounded with the concentration camps, in which relief was restricted. Cite your source where Turkey is saying that.
/* The Position of Turkey */ Wikifying and also, there is no publications justifying the temporary camps, stick to what is said.
/* The Position of Turkey */ where Turkey claims that? Do not mistake the transit camps with the concentration camps.
/* The Position of Turkey */ Stick to Turkeys position about the issue.
what talk exactly you meant? -pov tag
